actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that the appointment of the Postmaster General and the Deputy Postmaster General of the United States shall be subject to confirmation by the Senate.

summary.text: Makes the appointment of the Postmaster General and the Deputy Postmaster General subject to confirmation by the Senate.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that the appointment of the Postmaster General and the Deputy Postmaster General of the United States shall be subject to confirmation by the Senate.
